issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Problem with Geolocation watchPosition if not calling watchHeading

comments.body:
{html}

(from [9510dc89620677ba615a8a70904b51c4ab711959]) [#288 state:resolved] fixed geo problem with not properly start watchLocation unless you do watchHeading on iPhone. [#289 state:resolved] introduce Titanium.JSON.stringify API for iphone to sync with Android and Desktop APIs http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/9510dc8962067...

{html}
